channel.title: Client Shuts Down
channel.description: im trying to play my friends server and i run the client and i log in and everything but after i take a few steps i log out and get some java error. i have java 20 and JDK 20 and both are in my environment variables im running windows 7 64-bit but my java is saved at program files not program files (x86) so my variables are set to normal program files which is the correct thing, but yet my client shuts off, any help will be appreciated thank you!

item.title: Client Shuts Down
item.dc:creator: @Nom_Nom Nom Nom
item.description:
@Nom_Nom wrote:

Right in your run.bat or w/e it’ll say

java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32

or

start java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32

Delete the start java or jave w/e yours says then replace that with the file path to the java file. So then it should look like this

“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32

Hope it works. Dunno why it happens. :S

Read full topic

item.title: Client Shuts Down
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

im trying to play my friends server and i run the client and i log in and everything but after i take a few steps i log out and get some java error. i have java 20 and JDK 20 and both are in my environment variables im running windows 7 64-bit but my java is saved at program files not program files (x86) so my variables are set to normal program files which is the correct thing, but yet my client shuts off, any help will be appreciated thank you!
